articles.title: Federal judge overturns Texas mask mandate ban for public schools - Axios
articles.description: The judge ruled the Americans with Disabilities Act overrides Abbott's order.
articles.content:
A federal judge ruled Wednesday that Texas Gov. Greg Abbott's (R) ban on mask mandates in state public schools "violates" the rights of students with disabilities.

articles.description: The flight marks the third "operational" space station crew sent to orbit aboard a Dragon capsule since Nasa and SpaceX teamed up to resume space launches from American soil last year, following a nine-year hiatus.
articles.content:

articles.title: The Importance of Smoking Cessation - LMH Health
articles.description: The American Cancer Society states that smoking causes an estimated 480,000 deaths every year, or about 1 in 5 deaths. On top of this, more than 16 million Americans live with a smoking-related disease.
articles.content:
